name: Ethanol, 85%, at blending terminal, 2022
description:
transport of gasoline is accounted by using the ecoinvent "petrol, at regional storage" process which includes transport to refueling station as well as the operation of the refueling station. The process of blending (and its energy use) is included in this and the related process, "E85, at blending terminal", as well as the infrastructure for additional terminals and blending apparatus. Infrastructure for refueling stations are included in the processes "E10, pumped into vehicle" and "E85, pumped into vehicle."  
The production of ethanol utilized in this process assigns inputs to co-products (e.g., wheat kernals and straw, corn grain and stover) based on activities and inputs that are required for the growth and harvest and preprocessing of, e.g., wheat straw, and none that of the activities or inputs that would normally be used to produce, harvest and preprocess, e.g., wheat kernals (so-called "incremental allocation").

processDocumentation.restrictionsDescription: All information can be accessed by everybody.

exchanges.description: to determine the energy content of the product E85
assumes medium voltage for this industrial activity. Medium voltage is 1 - 24 kV (Swiss estimate; personal communication with Christian Bauer, modeler of this process)
compliment of the above. This is the Ecoinvent "at regional storage" process with US gasoline as the input. US gasoline is the US LCI process with water added (from ANL 2009 report)

piece per kg throughput of E85 through lifetime of terminals tanks (50 years, i.e., until 2057). The cumulative volume calcuation is a placeholder estimate for what should be used which accounts for the fraction of cumulative total (E10+E85) EISA sales volume that is E85.

flow.name: CUTOFF Liquid storage tank, chemicals, organics

exchanges.description: this is the proportion by weight of denatured ethanol in E85. If denaturing is 3.95w% and total percent ethanol is 78w% in E85, then 0.78/0.9605 = blend percent (by weight) of denatured ethanol in E85.
